Room.Name: Eidenhoft Boulevard/Netherworld Lane Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Eidenhoft Boulevard and Netherworld Lane.
Room.LongDescription: Netherworld Lane crosses Eidenhoft Boulevard in an east to west direction. The wide street gets its name because it passes on the north side of the Necropolis, an eerie "City for the Dead." Eidenhoft Boulevard continues to the north and south, bisecting most of the city.
